text: Luanne Ruth Schedeen (born January 8, 1949), known professionally as Anne Schedeen, is an American actress. She is known for playing Kate Tanner on the series ALF from 1986 until 1990. She appeared as Emily Phillips in the second season of the successful comedy series Cheers. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon
title: Anne Schedeen
